name: Jack's Halloween
description:
Created with Renpy 8

It's Halloween night!

Jack is a high school senior who plans to spend the Halloween at home in leisure. But David, a jock who attracts trouble, is having a party, and the sweet girl Jennifer is going... will Jack go to the party with Jennifer?

Features
  • 10-15 minutes of gameplay
  • 3 unique characters with school outfit and Halloween costume illustrations
  • Character expressions
  • 3 endings
  • 3,700 words
Characters Developer's Note

My first game project that I thought of while playing with my cats a couple weeks before Halloween. I hope you like it!
